title: FS: T213 Coupon Walter Johnson - SGC 55
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T213 Coupon Walter Johnson - SGC 55
posts.post_content: Firmly asking $2500. Probably the best one in existence, and pretty scarce to boot.
Hate to bump this one up the stack so soon, but I do need to put a price tag on it in time for weekend buyers to peruse. Asking $2500 delivered.
